Articles.Content:
So gentlemen, I wish to inquire, who here has at all played Aurora? It is a Space 4x game, and here is the forum: http://aurora2.pentarch.org/index.php

I will be starting an interactive AAR soon.
I really really would like to get into it. Do you have any idea where I could start?

I really really would like to get into it. Do you have any idea where I could start?

Hmm... I will be starting an AAR soon, so you can watch me (also a beginner) attempt this game, and fail badly. I will need companies that make certain components, for example weapons, electronics, engines and that such.
